      • readClientInput

        protected static byte[] readClientInput(InputStream input)
        Read a client-provided stream into memory. Report it as a client error if the stream cannot be read. Closes the stream.
        Parameters:
        input - an input stream from a RESTful request
        Returns:
        a byte array of the input stream contents

      • write

        protected void write(byte[] fileData,
         String fsid)
              throws org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException,
                     IOException
        Write the base article XML to the file store. If something is already stored at the same file store ID, it is overwritten; else, a new file is created.
        Parameters:
        fileData - the data to write, as raw bytes
        fsid - the file store ID
        Throws:
        org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException
        IOException

        Throws:
        IOException

      • parseXml

        protected static Document parseXml(InputStream stream)
                            throws IOException,
                                   RestClientException
        Parse client-provided XML. Errors are handled according to whether they most likely were caused by the client or the server.
        Parameters:
        stream - an input stream containing an XML document as raw bytes
        Returns:
        the XML document parsed from the stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if the stream cannot be read
        RestClientException - if the stream does not contain valid XML

      • findSingleEntity

        protected <S,T> T findSingleEntity(String hql,
                       S id)
        Loads a single entity from the datastore based on some unique property.
        Type Parameters:
        S - type of the identifier
        T - type of the entity being queried/returned
        Parameters:
        hql - Hibernate Query Language string specifying the select. Should have a single parameter corresponding to id. Example: "from Foo where fooID = ?"
        id - unique identifier for the entity
        Returns:
        the retrieved entity
        Throws:
        RestClientException - if no entity is found matching the given ID
